title: Launching of STAR-FARM Project Phase II
summary: Phase II of the STAR-FARM project officially kicks off with a multi-stakeholder meeting in Can Tho, focusing on climate-resilient farming systems.

title: Workshop on Agroecological Monitoring in Mekong Delta
summary: Experts from IRD, CIRAD, and FAO shared key methodologies for KPI-based agroecological monitoring adapted to the region.

title: Field Trip: Soil Health Assessment in Tra Vinh
summary: A cross-disciplinary team visited farming plots in Tra Vinh to test @biofunctool and observe macrofauna indicators.

title: Policy Dialogue on Sustainable Rice Landscapes
summary: A policy roundtable was held to integrate agroecological KPIs into national planning for sustainable rice production.

title: Open Data Platform Integrates Sentinel-1 Access
summary: The STAR-FARM data portal now includes direct access to Copernicus Sentinel-1 data to support remote sensing of agricultural landscapes.
